messageId.description: System wide unique identifier describing the message

correlationId.description: In the response message, the messageId of the original message

publishedstring.description: Point in time when message was dispatched

expirationstring.description: Point in time when message expires

messageSequence.description: If the message is part of a sequence, the location of the message in that sequence

position.description: Position in the sequence to which the message belongs

total.description: Total number of messages in the sequence

messageHistory.description: The route of the message up to and including this point in time

machineId.description: ID of the machine that generated the history entry

machineAddress.description: Hostname, IP or other identifying network address of the generating machine

string.description: Time at which this history entry was generates

version.description: version of the Messaging API specification

errorCode.description: Code representing the error that occurred
